name: Qingcheng Mountain Hike
description: Try this 7.4-km loop trail near Dujiangyan, Sichuan. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 3 h 12 min to complete. This is a very popular area for birding, hiking, and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The trail is open year-round and is beautiful to visit anytime.
